# https://www.codechef.com/problems/COOLING
tc = int(raw_input())
for i in range(tc):
    cnt = int(raw_input())
    pies = map(int, raw_input().split())
    racks = map(int, raw_input().split())
    pies.sort()
    racks.sort()
    count = 0
    for c in pies:
        for v in racks:
            if c <= v:
                racks.remove(v)
                count += 1
                break

    print count
